info.title: ✦ Base rules ✦
info.text:
✧ I don't do real human photo redraws
✧ No NSWF
[ I'm okay with NSWF refs though ]
✧ Image format is PNG
✧ The work process contains 3 stages; black&white sketch, color scheme and rendering. Each of them will be shown in the chat. The color scheme picture will look very untidy, that's okay. The finished picture will be sent to you via email or may be uploaded to the Google Drive

info.title: ✦ Payment ✦
info.text:
✧ Payment via Hipolink
✧ If the client doesn't reply within a week*, the order may be canceled
*within 20 days If the payment has been sent
✧ Prepayment - 100%
[ 50%/50% ( before and after sketch ) is available for $180+ price ]
✧ No refunds
[ Due to my location, I literally won't be able to return money ]

info.title: ✦ Terms of Use ✦
info.text:
✧ For personal use only
[ the price for commercial use is discussed in a private chat ]
✧ I reserve the right to decline the commission without explanation
[ before receiving payment, of course ]
✧ I reserve the right to post the final image on social media and my portfolio
✧ The drawing process may be used as the video background on my YouTube channel. This also means, that the character's refs might get caught on video. If you're not okay with that, please let me know so I can hide them
